meanings.definition: A unit of electrical resistance equal to one thousandth of an ohm.
meanings.sent1: I measured the resistance of the circuit in milliohms.
meanings.sent2: The multimeter displayed a reading in milliohms.
meanings.sent3: It was so cold that even the milliohms of resistance seemed to shiver.
meanings.sent4: The milliohms of opposition in their debate created sparks of disagreement.
meanings.sent5: The tiny milliohms of resistance were like invisible barriers in the circuit.

meanings.sent1: The electronic device required several milliohms to function properly.
meanings.sent2: The technician checked the connections for any loose milliohms.
meanings.sent3: The box was filled with colorful milliohms, each representing a different value.
meanings.sent4: The room buzzed with energy, like a swarm of milliohms ready to power up.
meanings.sent5: The milliohms in the system worked together harmoniously, like a symphony of resistance.
